exercises.name: Air Squats
exercises.description: A basic squat without weights to engage the legs and glutes.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend your knees and lower into a squat.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: A simple exercise to warm up the shoulders and arms.
steps: Extend your arms out to the sides.
Make small circles with your arms.
Gradually increase the circle size.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: A shoulder press exercise involving rotation.
steps: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you.
Press the dumbbells upward while rotating your wrists.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Alternating Lunges
exercises.description: A lower-body exercise that alternates lunging with each leg.
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Step forward with one leg and lower into a lunge.
Return to the starting position and switch legs.

exercises.name: Abdominal Crunch
exercises.description: A core exercise to strengthen the abdominal muscles.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Lift your shoulders off the ground towards your knees.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A high-intensity full-body exercise.
steps: Start in a standing position.
Drop into a squat, then jump into a plank.
Perform a push-up, then return to a standing position with a jump.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: An exercise to strengthen the biceps.
steps: Hold dumbbells at your sides.
Curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Bent-over Rows
exercises.description: A back exercise involving pulling weights towards your chest.
steps: Bend forward at the hips while holding weights.
Pull the weights towards your chest.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise involving jumping onto a box.
steps: Stand in front of a box or platform.
Jump onto the box with both feet.
Step down and repeat.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: A classic exercise for the chest and triceps.
steps: Lie on a bench with a barbell above you.
Lower the barbell to your chest.
Push it back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: A core exercise to strengthen the abdominal muscles.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Lift your shoulders towards your knees.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: An exercise to strengthen the calf muscles.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Raise your heels to stand on your toes.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Chest Flyes
exercises.description: A chest exercise involving opening and closing the arms with weights.
steps: Lie on a bench with dumbbells in each hand.
Open your arms outward, then bring them back together.
Repeat.

exercises.name: Chin-Ups
exercises.description: An upper body exercise where you pull yourself up to a bar.
steps: Grab a pull-up bar with palms facing you.
Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Crossbody Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise involving alternating leg movements in a plank position.
steps: Start in a plank position.
Bring one knee towards the opposite elbow.
Switch to the other leg.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.description: An upper body exercise involving lowering and raising the body using parallel bars.
steps: Hold onto parallel bars with arms straight.
Lower yourself down by bending your elbows.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: A compound exercise involving lifting weights from the ground.
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Bend down to grab the barbell.
Lift it up while keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Decline Push-Ups
exercises.description: A push-up variation with feet raised higher than the hands.
steps: Place your feet on a bench or platform.
Perform a push-up as usual.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An upper body exercise with dumbbells targeting the shoulders.
steps: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press them upward.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Dragon Flags
exercises.description: An advanced core exercise involving lifting the legs while maintaining a straight body.
steps: Lie on a bench and grab the bench behind your head.
Raise your legs while keeping your body straight.
Lower your body slowly.

exercises.name: Elevated Planks
exercises.description: A plank variation with raised feet for additional challenge.
steps: Start in a plank position with feet raised.
Hold the position for a set time.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Elbow Plank
exercises.description: A plank variation done on the elbows.
steps: Start in a plank position on your elbows.
Hold the position for a set time.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: EZ Bar Curls
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the biceps with an EZ bar.
steps: Hold an EZ bar with an underhand grip.
Curl it towards your shoulders.
Lower it back down.

exercises.name: Farmers Walk
exercises.description: An exercise involving walking while carrying heavy weights.
steps: Hold heavy dumbbells in each hand.
Walk a set distance or time.
Rest and repeat.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.description: An upper body exercise involving pulling a cable towards your face.
steps: Attach a rope to a cable machine at head height.
Pull the rope towards your face.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: An upper body exercise with dumbbells, raising them in front of you.
steps: Hold dumbbells in each hand.
Raise them straight in front of you.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Forward Lunges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving lunging forward with one leg.
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Step forward with one leg and lower into a lunge.
Return to the starting position and switch legs.

exercises.name: Floor Press
exercises.description: A chest exercise where you press weights while lying on the floor.
steps: Lie on your back on the floor with dumbbells.
Press the dumbbells upwards.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that targets the glutes and hamstrings.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Lift your hips towards the ceiling.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation where you hold a weight in front of you.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest height.
Lower into a squat and return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Good Mornings
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving bending at the hips.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend at the hips while keeping your back straight.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: An arm exercise where you curl weights with a neutral grip.
steps: Hold dumbbells with a neutral grip.
Curl them towards your shoulders.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Hip Thrusts
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the glutes by thrusting the hips upward.
steps: Sit with your back against a bench and knees bent.
Place a barbell across your hips.
Thrust your hips upwards, then lower back down.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: A cardio exercise where you bring your knees high while running in place.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Run in place while bringing your knees up.
Maintain a high tempo.

exercises.name: Inchworms
exercises.description: A full-body exercise involving bending and walking out into a plank.
steps: Stand and bend at the waist.
Walk your hands forward into a plank position.
Walk your feet towards your hands and return to standing.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: A bench press variation on an incline bench.
steps: Set a bench to an incline position.
Hold a barbell or dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press the weights upwards and return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Isometric Holds
exercises.description: An exercise involving holding a static position for a set time.
steps: Assume a specific position (like a plank or squat hold).
Hold the position for a set duration.
Release and rest.

exercises.name: Jackknives
exercises.description: A core exercise involving raising both legs and upper body.
steps: Lie on your back with legs extended.
Lift your legs and upper body to meet in the middle.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: A cardio exercise involving jumping and spreading your arms and legs.
steps: Start with feet together and arms by your sides.
Jump while spreading your arms and legs.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation involving jumping at the top of the squat.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower into a squat, then jump up.
Land softly and repeat.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: An exercise involving swinging a kettlebell in front of you.
steps: Hold a kettlebell with both hands.
Swing it forward while keeping your back straight.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Knee Push-Ups
exercises.description: A modified push-up where you perform it on your knees.
steps: Start in a push-up position on your knees.
Lower your chest to the ground.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Deadlifts
exercises.description: A deadlift variation using kettlebells.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Hold a kettlebell between your legs.
Lift it by straightening your legs and keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Snatches
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise involving swinging a kettlebell overhead.
steps: Hold a kettlebell with one hand.
Swing it up and over your head.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: A shoulder exercise involving raising dumbbells to the side.
steps: Hold dumbbells in each hand.
Raise them outward to the side.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A lower body exercise using a leg press machine.
steps: Sit on a leg press machine.
Place your feet on the platform.
Push to extend your legs and then return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.description: A leg exercise targeting the hamstrings with a machine.
steps: Lie on a leg curl machine with your ankles under the pad.
Curl the pad towards your glutes.
Lower it back down.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Raises
exercises.description: A core exercise involving raising the legs while lying down.
steps: Lie on your back with legs extended.
Raise your legs towards the ceiling.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.description: A back exercise using a lat pulldown machine.
steps: Sit on a lat pulldown machine with the bar overhead.
Pull the bar down towards your chest.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.description: A leg exercise targeting the quadriceps with a machine.
steps: Sit on a leg extension machine with your ankles under the pad.
Extend your legs forward.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A high-intensity cardio exercise involving alternating leg movements.
steps: Start in a plank position.
Bring one knee towards your chest and switch legs.
Maintain a high tempo.

exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slams
exercises.description: An exercise involving slamming a medicine ball into the ground.
steps: Hold a medicine ball overhead.
Slam it into the ground with force.
Pick it up and repeat.

exercises.name: Mobility Drills
exercises.description: A series of exercises to improve flexibility and joint mobility.
steps: Perform various stretches and movements to increase mobility.
Focus on tight or restricted areas.
Hold each position for a set time.

exercises.name: Muscle-Ups
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise combining a pull-up and a dip.
steps: Start with a pull-up.
Transition into a dip at the top.
Lower back down and repeat.

exercises.name: Neutral Grip Pull-Ups
exercises.description: A pull-up variation with a neutral grip on the bar.
steps: Grab a pull-up bar with palms facing each other.
Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Nordic Curls
exercises.description: A hamstring exercise involving lowering and raising the body.
steps: Secure your ankles while kneeling.
Lower your body towards the ground.
Return to the upright position.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: A shoulder exercise involving pressing weights overhead.
steps: Hold a barbell or dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press them overhead and return to the starting position.
Repeat.

exercises.name: One-Arm Rows
exercises.description: A back exercise using a dumbbell for single-arm rows.
steps: Bend forward at the hips while holding a dumbbell.
Pull the dumbbell towards your chest.
Lower it back down.

exercises.name: Oblique Crunches
exercises.description: A core exercise targeting the oblique muscles.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Twist your upper body to engage the obliques.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Plank Variations
exercises.description: Various plank exercises to strengthen the core.
steps: Perform different plank variations (e.g., side plank, elbow plank).
Hold each plank for a set time.
Switch between variations.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.description: An upper body exercise involving pulling yourself up to a bar.
steps: Grab a pull-up bar with palms facing forward.
Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Pistol Squats
exercises.description: A one-legged squat exercise.
steps: Stand on one leg and extend the other forward.
Lower into a squat on the standing leg.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.description: A classic exercise involving lowering and raising the body with arms.
steps: Start in a plank position.
Lower your body towards the ground.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Power Cleans
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise involving lifting a barbell from the ground to the shoulders.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lift the barbell from the ground to your shoulders.
Lower it back down.

exercises.name: Plyometric Push-Ups
exercises.description: A push-up variation involving explosive movement.
steps: Start in a push-up position.
Perform a push-up with enough force to lift off the ground.
Land softly and repeat.

exercises.name: Prone Rows
exercises.description: A back exercise involving pulling weights while lying prone.
steps: Lie on a bench in a prone position.
Pull the weights towards your chest.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Plank Jacks
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise involving jumping in a plank position.
steps: Start in a plank position.
Jump with your feet while in the plank.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Quad Stretches
exercises.description: A stretching exercise to loosen the quadriceps.
steps: Stand on one leg and grab your opposite ankle.
Pull your ankle towards your glutes.
Hold for a set time and switch legs.

exercises.name: Quadruped Extensions
exercises.description: A core exercise involving extending one arm and one leg.
steps: Start on your hands and knees.
Extend one arm and the opposite leg.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Quadruped Leg Raises
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving raising one leg while on hands and knees.
steps: Start on hands and knees.
Raise one leg towards the ceiling.
Return to the starting position and switch legs.

exercises.name: Reverse Flyes
exercises.description: A shoulder exercise involving raising dumbbells behind you.
steps: Hold dumbbells in each hand and bend forward at the hips.
Raise the dumbbells outward and backward.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: A core exercise involving twisting the upper body while sitting.
steps: Sit on the floor with knees bent.
Twist your upper body to one side.
Switch to the other side.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Raises
exercises.description: A shoulder exercise targeting the rear deltoids.
steps: Hold dumbbells in each hand and bend forward at the hips.
Raise the dumbbells outward behind you.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.description: A deadlift variation focusing on the hamstrings.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend forward at the hips while holding a barbell.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Skater Jumps
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise involving lateral jumps.
steps: Jump laterally from one foot to the other.
Land softly and repeat on the opposite side.
Maintain a high tempo.

exercises.name: Side Planks
exercises.description: A plank variation where you hold a side position.
steps: Lie on your side with legs extended.
Lift your body into a side plank.
Hold the position for a set time.

exercises.name: Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.description: An upper body exercise involving shrugging the shoulders with weights.
steps: Hold dumbbells or a barbell in each hand.
Shrug your shoulders upwards.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Seated Rows
exercises.description: A back exercise using a rowing machine or cable row.
steps: Sit on a rowing machine or cable row.
Pull the handle towards your chest.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Split Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation with one leg forward and one leg back.
steps: Stand with one leg forward and one leg back.
Lower into a squat on the front leg.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Deadlifts
exercises.description: A deadlift variation involving balancing on one leg.
steps: Stand on one leg while holding weights.
Bend forward at the hips while lifting the opposite leg.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raises
exercises.description: A calf exercise involving raising and lowering the heels.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Raise your heels to stand on your toes.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Side Lunges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving lunging to the side.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lunge to one side while keeping the opposite leg straight.
Return to the starting position and switch sides.

exercises.name: Supermans
exercises.description: A back exercise involving raising the arms and legs while lying prone.
steps: Lie on your stomach with arms extended forward.
Lift your arms and legs off the ground.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Suspension Push-Ups
exercises.description: A push-up variation using suspension trainers.
steps: Hold onto suspension trainers in a push-up position.
Lower your body towards the ground.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Spiderman Push-Ups
exercises.description: A push-up variation involving bringing the knee to the elbow.
steps: Start in a push-up position.
Lower into a push-up while bringing the knee towards the elbow.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving stepping onto a platform.
steps: Stand in front of a platform or bench.
Step onto the platform with one leg.
Step back down and switch legs.

exercises.name: Tire Flips
exercises.description: A full-body exercise involving flipping a large tire.
steps: Stand in front of a large tire.
Bend down and grab the tire.
Lift and flip the tire over.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: An upper body exercise involving lowering and raising the body using parallel bars.
steps: Hold onto parallel bars with arms straight.
Lower yourself down by bending your elbows.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Tricep Kickbacks
exercises.description: An arm exercise targeting the triceps with dumbbells.
steps: Hold dumbbells in each hand and bend forward at the hips.
Extend the dumbbells backwards to engage the triceps.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Ups
exercises.description: A full-body exercise involving getting up with a kettlebell overhead.
steps: Lie on your back while holding a kettlebell overhead.
Get up while keeping the kettlebell overhead.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Tuck Jumps
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise involving jumping and tucking the knees.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Jump while tucking your knees to your chest.
Land softly and repeat.

exercises.name: Upward Rows
exercises.description: An upper body exercise involving pulling weights upward.
steps: Hold a barbell or dumbbells with a close grip.
Pull the weights upwards towards your chin.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Upright Rows
exercises.description: A shoulder exercise involving pulling weights upward.
steps: Hold dumbbells or a barbell with a close grip.
Pull the weights upwards towards your chin.
Lower them back down.

exercises.name: Underhand Pull-Ups
exercises.description: A pull-up variation with an underhand grip.
steps: Grab a pull-up bar with palms facing you.
Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Upper Body Rotation
exercises.description: An exercise involving rotating the upper body while holding weights.
steps: Hold a weight or a resistance band.
Rotate your upper body to one side.
Switch to the other side.

exercises.name: V-Ups
exercises.description: A core exercise involving raising both legs and upper body into a V-shape.
steps: Lie on your back with legs extended.
Lift your legs and upper body to meet in the middle.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Vertical Jumps
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise involving jumping vertically.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Jump as high as possible.
Land softly and repeat.

exercises.name: V-Sits
exercises.description: A core exercise involving holding a V-shape position.
steps: Sit on the floor with legs extended.
Lift your legs and upper body into a V-shape.
Hold the position for a set time.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving lunging while walking.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Step forward with one leg into a lunge.
Continue lunging as you walk.

exercises.name: Wall Sits
exercises.description: A lower body exercise involving sitting against a wall.
steps: Stand with your back against a wall.
Lower into a sitting position while keeping your back straight.
Hold the position for a set time.

exercises.name: Wide-Grip Pull-Ups
exercises.description: A pull-up variation with a wide grip on the bar.
steps: Grab a pull-up bar with a wide grip.
Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower back down.

exercises.name: Windshield Wipers
exercises.description: A core exercise involving rotating the legs while lying on the back.
steps: Lie on your back with legs extended.
Rotate your legs to one side while keeping your shoulders on the ground.
Switch to the other side.

exercises.name: Walking Planks
exercises.description: A plank variation involving moving from hands to elbows.
steps: Start in a plank position on your elbows.
Move to a plank position on your hands.
Return to elbows and repeat.

exercises.name: Yoga Stretches
exercises.description: Various yoga poses and stretches for flexibility and relaxation.
steps: Perform different yoga poses and stretches.
Hold each position for a set time.
Switch between poses.

exercises.name: Y-T-W Raises
exercises.description: A shoulder exercise involving raising the arms into Y, T, and W shapes.
steps: Lie on your stomach with arms extended.
Raise your arms into Y, T, and W shapes.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Yogic Breathing
exercises.description: A breathing exercise involving deep breaths and relaxation.
steps: Sit in a comfortable position.
Breathe deeply and slowly.
Focus on relaxing the body.

exercises.name: Zottman Curls
exercises.description: An arm exercise involving curling weights with a rotating grip.
steps: Hold dumbbells with an underhand grip.
Curl them towards your shoulders.
Rotate to an overhand grip and lower back down.

exercises.name: Zombie Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation involving extended arms.
steps: Stand with arms extended forward.
Lower into a squat.
Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Zercher Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation where the barbell is held in the crook of the elbows.
steps: Hold a barbell in the crook of your elbows.
Lower into a squat.
Return to the starting position.
